name: 焦奎璇
bio_zh: 我目前是西北工业大学自动化学院的硕士一年级研究生（2025年-至今），师从张鼎文教授。我的研究兴趣包括3D视觉，3DAIGC，多模态。
bio_en: I am currently a first-year master's student at the School of Automation, Northwestern Polytechnical University (2025 - present), under the supervision of Professor Zhang Dingwen. My research interests include 3D vision, 3DAIGC, and multimodal large models.
